about_the_game:
In an attempt to escape from poverty Melinda infiltrated Salguro's Castle, now, she must escape it.
Become an agile dual-wielder of magic artifacs and fight the many minions of The Sulgeri Witches as well as a parasitic force that prowls the halls of the castle...

Sorceress is an immersive first person action-adventure game focused on improvisation through creative use of elemental magic and flexible systems. Step into the boots of Melinda, and become a nimble quickwitted mage, cast spells from your arsenal of weapons and cause demise on your enemies while traversing the halls and corridors of Salguro's Castle, looking for a way to free Melinda from her disease...

  • Explore a wide assortment of hand-crafted levels, each with unique elements and optional challenges
  • Fight the resilient Parasite that has taken home on the castles' corridors and collect its precious spores

  • Magic Weapons to manipulate physics and cause elemental reactions
  • Customize your loadout and get creative to have an edge in combat
  • Combine spells and be crafty to make the most out of your actions

  • Jump, run, kick and dash. Be agile and weave through the battlefield
  • Fire sources, electric machinery, crates and barrels, everything is interactable!
  • Steal your enemies' weapons and throw them back or keep them for later

short_description: Sorceress is a first-person action-adventure game with a strong focus on flexible systems and emergent gameplay. Become a versatile wielder of arcane gadgetry and escape from a castle where unrestricted experiments have led to a conflict against a mysterious and ruthless threat.
